game.name: Warrior Princess Hospital Recovery
game.description:
A sudden injury has hit the Warrior Princess in a war and she is anxiously seeking for a doctor. Hope you have the good doctor skills to give her a proper treatment. Make sure to heal her wounds with the help of the advanced tools and equipment. Use the right medicine to make her calm down and help her overcome the extreme pain. You can begin Warrior Princess Hospital Recovery game by changing her ripped outfits into a silk robe.  

You are advised to place the proper casts on the broken bones to provide her a complete recovery solution in this free online doctor game for girls. The accident occurred when this brave princess was riding on her fast running horse. Apart from the breaking of her arm, she has also faced some other unwanted injuries during the accident. Your job in this cool html5 game is to take the princess to the doctors clinic and get her injuries repaired as soon as possible.  

Join this daring and courageous woman, Mulan is one of the most challenging and interesting doctor games for girls and boys. You will surely feel proud of yourself after taking her to the hospital and getting her patched quickly. She will definitely be highly thankful to you if you are able to give her a proper treatment without getting her wounds infected with other dangerous germs. Give her a painkiller, conduct an X-ray and find out the fractures in the bones of her arm. Use the bandage or cast, if required. Good luck friends to score high in this girls doctor game!
